data.title: Famous April Birthdays. By Holiday Insights.
data.meta_description: Famous April Birthdays. Who was born in April? Who was born on your birthday? Holiday Insights daily calendar facts, fun, trivia.
data.text:

Holiday Insights, where every day is a holiday, a bizarre day, an April National holiday, a wacky day, or a special event. Join us in the fun each and every day of the year.

Did You Know? There are literally thousands of holidays, special events and observances, more than one for every day of the year. Many new holidays are being created on a very frequent basis. At Holiday Insights we strive to thoroughly research and report details of each one as accurately as possible.
